title: President invites entrepreneurs to invest in local industries
content: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has invited local entrepreneurs to invest in local industries and join in the process of nation building.The President made these remarks at a discussion held with large scale entrepreneurs in various fields at the Presidential Secretariat today (21).The discussion was convened with the objective of obtaining the assistance of the private sector in the development process, the Presidentâ€™s Media Division said.
